name: Tellus
description:
This was literally the first game I ever made. It was 2010 and I was  first year student at university studying games design. Back then we used processing and I always wanted to remake it in Unity and after almost 9 years, here we are.

The assignment at the time was to take a classic game, in my case it was Asteroids, and and change the gameplay. I have to be honest with you, I was focusing more on the colors and particles than anything else and it was a challenge making it look and feel exactly like "the original", down to font, music and colors.

Maybe in another 9 years I'll add some gameplay elements to it to make it a bit more exciting.

All shapes such as the aliens, planet, player and particles are all vectors!
